New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 48th ODI century
Kohli is one short of Sachin Tendulkar's world record of 49 ODI centuries
Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya hobbled off with a twisted left ankle
Bangladesh got off to a great start with Tanzid Hasan and Litton Das
Kuldeep Yadav provided the breakthrough with a lbw dismissal
Ravindra Jadeja inflicted more damage with wickets
Pre-Game Insights: Virat Kohli wanted to make a big contribution
Bangladesh got a great start on a batting-friendly surface
Kohli said it’s a special feeling to play the tournament in India
The MCA Stadium was at full capacity
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli said it’s a special feeling
Rohit Sharma said Pandya did not bowl or field for the remainder of the game
Bangladesh stayed seventh with just two points from one win in four games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh’s fightback after a strong start
Mehidy Hasan Miraz was surprisingly promoted
The Indian openers sped off the block
Shubman Gill scored his maiden World Cup half-century
